editPhotoText: Use the mask to determine the necessary area. Drag the mask to resize and reposition it. Preview the result and click 'Save picture' to apply the changes.
interviewDescription: A little description of the interview
mapNothingFound: Unfortunately, there are no markers in this area yet.
videoBlockTxt: To embed a video from YouTube, open the web page with the desired video, find the Share button, select Paste, copy the link from the src field in the embed window, and paste it into the text box below.
